function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 on construction professionals' perceptions","Impact":"Potential for increased stress, anxiety, and mental health issues among construction professionals","Mitigation":"Provide mental health resources, support, and counseling for construction professionals","Technologies":"Online mental health platforms, teletherapy services","People":"Construction professionals","Owner":"Construction companies, mental health organizations"},{"Description":"Variability of perceptions among different groups and over time","Impact":"Potential for misalignment in response plans and strategies","Mitigation":"Adopt global approaches where there is consensus and localize response plans where there is divergence","Technologies":"Data analytics for trend analysis, communication platforms for global collaboration","People":"Construction managers, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Limitations in study design and generalization of outcomes","Impact":"Risk of drawing inaccurate conclusions and making unreliable decisions based on the study results","Mitigation":"Increase sample size, conduct studies in other countries, and conduct further rounds of surveys","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools, survey platforms","People":"Research team, construction professionals, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"}]}
